Text.Value: How did you find out about Orpheus?
Leave.
*The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*

EditorData.logicalname: DOESN'T KNOW ANSWER - DELETE IF NOT NEEDED

Text.Value: Vlaakith... threatens... punishes...
Do others here read the Orpheus stories?
Do others here believe in Orpheus?
Why is he forbidden?
Refused to kill... cut down by stranger...
...everything... I tried not to be...
...believer... in the true prince...
About that. My friend wants to apologise. For accidentally killing you.
Orpheus... inspiration... gives me hope...
Armour... Voss' warriors... hidden inside...
What do you think of Sa'varsh Kethk?
What do you think of your teacher?
Why didn't you fight back?
Varrl... hatchling...
Who is the true prince?
What do you think of Vlaakith?
Lost prince... son of Gith... forbidden...
What can you tell me about Orpheus?
*The corpse remains silent. It waits for you to ask a question.*
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
*The corpse regards you lifelessly.*
Why were you carrying this book?
Orpheus...
What happened to you?
About that. My friend wants to apologise. For killing you.
Who is Orpheus?
Refused to kill... punishment is death...
Cruel queen... taints... poisons... keeps control...
Who are you?
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
Weak-minded... sycophantic... cruel...
Tired of killing... Orpheus... better way...
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*
What do you know about Orpheus?

Synopsis: The boy speaks about the situation the player encountered, and his knowledge of Orpheus.
